titleInfo.title: Memo re: Volleyball Coach, Athletic Trainer, and Student Athletics Survey

mods.abstract: Memorandum from Tennessee Tech University President Arliss L. Roaden to Chairman of Health and Physical Education Dr. Flavious L. Smith regarding the Athletic Committee's recommendation to hire a volleyball coach and athletic trainer for women's athletics, and Dr. David L. Larimore's survey of student interest in athletic programs to inform compliance with Title IX. Includes a copy of a memorandum from Dr. Smith to President Roaden on the same topics.

name.namePart: Tennessee Technological University. Office of the President

subject.topic: United States. Education Amendments of 1972. Title IX
Tennessee Technological University. Department of Exercise Science
Tennessee Technological University. College of Education

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Tennessee Technological University. Archives and Special Collections
